title: Calculate Value at Risk (VaR)
description: A risk manager calculates the Value at Risk (VaR) for the company's trading portfolio to estimate the potential maximum loss over a single day.

tasks.description: Retrieve all positions in the trading portfolio.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete list of all open positions is retrieved.

tasks.description: Gather historical market price data and calculate the volatility and correlations of the relevant commodities.
tasks.expected_outcome: The statistical inputs for the VaR model are calculated.

tasks.description: Run the VaR model to calculate the 1-day, 95% confidence level VaR for the portfolio.
tasks.expected_outcome: The model outputs the VaR figure, e.g., '$5 million', which is then compared against a set limit.
